1   package org.lindbergframework.core.configuration;
2   
3   import java.util.ArrayList;
4   import java.util.List;
5   
6   import org.lindbergframework.beans.di.context.BeanFactory;
7   import org.lindbergframework.core.context.AllowIfContextActive;
8   import org.lindbergframework.core.context.CoreContext;
9   import org.lindbergframework.exception.InvalidConfigurationException;
10  import org.lindbergframework.persistence.configuration.LinpConfiguration;
11  import org.lindbergframework.util.ArrayUtil;
12  import org.lindbergframework.util.CollectionsUtil;
13  import org.lindbergframework.validation.configuration.ValidationConfiguration;
14  
15  /**
16   * Abstract core configuration class that provides the base operations for core configuration implementations.
17   * 
18   * @author Victor Lindberg
19   *
20   */
21  public abstract class AbstractCoreConfiguration extends ConfigurationRepository implements CoreConfiguration{
22      
23      /**
24       * lindberg persistence key in the values configurations repository. 
25       */
26      protected static final String LINP_CONFIGURATION_KEY = "linpConfiguration";
27      
28      /**
29       * lindberg validation key in the values configurations repository. 
30       */
31      protected static final String VALIDATION_CONFIGURATION_KEY = "validationConfiguration";
32      
33      public AbstractCoreConfiguration(){
34          //
35      }
36  
37      /**
38       * {@inheritDoc}
39       */
40      @AllowIfContextActive
41      public String getDIBasePackage() {
42          return super.getPropertyValue(CONFIG_PROPERTY_DI_BASEPACKAGE);
43      }
44  
45      /**
46       * {@inheritDoc}
47       */
48      @AllowIfContextActive
49      public BeanFactory getBeanFactory() {
50          return super.getPropertyValue(CONFIG_PROPERTY_BEAN_FACTORY);
51      }
52      
53      /**
54       * {@inheritDoc}
55       */
56      @AllowIfContextActive
57      public LinpConfiguration getLinpConfiguration() {
58          return super.getPropertyValue(LINP_CONFIGURATION_KEY);
59      }
60      
61      /**
62       * {@inheritDoc}
63       */
64      @AllowIfContextActive
65      public ValidationConfiguration getValidationConfiguration() {
66          return super.getPropertyValue(VALIDATION_CONFIGURATION_KEY);
67      }
68  
69      protected void setDiBasePackage(String diBasePackage) {
70          registerProperty(CONFIG_PROPERTY_DI_BASEPACKAGE, diBasePackage);
71      }
72  
73      protected void setBeanFactory(BeanFactory beanFactory) {
74          registerProperty(CONFIG_PROPERTY_BEAN_FACTORY, beanFactory);
75      }
76      
77      public void setLinpConfiguration(LinpConfiguration linpConfiguration){
78          registerProperty(LINP_CONFIGURATION_KEY, linpConfiguration);
79      }
80      
81      public void setValidationConfiguration(ValidationConfiguration validationConfiguration){
82          registerProperty(VALIDATION_CONFIGURATION_KEY, validationConfiguration);
83      }
84      
85      /**
86       * {@inheritDoc}
87       */
88      public void validate() throws InvalidConfigurationException {
89          //
90      }
91      
92      public void initializeContext() {
93          CoreContext.getInstance().loadConfiguration(this);
94      }
95      
96      public Configuration[] getModules() {
97          List<Configuration> configurations = new ArrayList<Configuration>();
98          Configuration linpConfiguration = getLinpConfiguration();
99          if (linpConfiguration != null)
100             configurations.add(linpConfiguration);
101         
102         Configuration valConfiguration = getValidationConfiguration();
103         if (valConfiguration != null)
104             configurations.add(valConfiguration);
105         
106         return configurations.toArray(new Configuration[configurations.size()]);
107     }
108 
109 }
